title: packaging is sometimes .tar.gz, sometimes .tgz
description:
In lucene tar-gz format is file.tar.gz while in solr it is file.tgz.
I think we would like them to be the same in the future?

comments.content:
I think this is important especially if we want to share these dist tasks across lucene and solr in the future.

the ant tasks are already called xxx-tgz, i think it makes the most sense to go .tgz across the board.
comments.author: Robert Muir
